com.drismo.gui.monitor
Class DebugMonitor

java.lang.Object
  android.content.Context
      android.content.ContextWrapper
          android.view.ContextThemeWrapper
              android.app.Activity
                  com.drismo.gui.monitor.MonitorActivityTemplate
                      com.drismo.gui.monitor.DebugMonitor
All Implemented Interfaces:
android.content.ComponentCallbacks, android.view.KeyEvent.Callback, android.view.LayoutInflater.Factory, android.view.View.OnCreateContextMenuListener, android.view.Window.Callback, CalibrationListener, FilteredAccelerationListener, QualityListener
public class DebugMonitor
extends MonitorActivityTemplate
implements FilteredAccelerationListener

Used to debug the calibration. Should not be used in the final release. Displays a real time graph representing the acceleration values with 3 coloured lines.

Nested Class Summary
private  class DebugMonitor.AccelerationGraph
          The graph representing the 50 last acceleration values.
